column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: More Chinese suspects have been arrested for illegal detention and extortion.------The arrests were made at 5:40 pm on December 20
column10: Phnom Penh.------The arrested men were named as:------LY KANGJIE
column14: a 27-year-old------The victim was named as HUANG BOLIN a 20 year old Chinese man (who also does not appear to have a passport/visa).------The five were taken away by the Bureau of Immigration and Customs Enforcement of the Phnom Penh Municipal Police Office from the municipal police force on charges of human trafficking and extortion.------TVFB
